subject: United Nations
body:
United Nations
Diplomatic Foreign Mission
760 United Nations Plaza, Manhattan, New York, United States.
This is to inform you that all the arrangements for the delivery of your
funds is completed today and the Diplomatic agent will depart for the
onward delivery of the consignment boxes to you once all the legal
documents  is secure on your behalf to avoid any hitch but be informed
that the Diplomatic agent did not know that the consignment boxes
contains your funds to avoid any hitch in the process of the delivery
and  for the safety of your funds, so do not allow anybody to know that
the boxes contains money including the agent until the boxes is
delivered to your address.
Also attached is a copy of the agent passport and the videos of the
boxes when the money was packed from the finance department and also be
aware that you will assist the agent to complete the clearance of boxes
on his arrival to your airport. You are advised to reconfirm below
information to the agent.
Full Name:
Full Address:
Mobile Number:
Private  email address:
Occupation:
Marital Status:
Age:
Sex:
Meanwhile, you should contact the agent with the above information on
his Email: 
diplomatdavidchurchill01@gmail.com
 or Whats app number +1
917-444-3066 for further instruction
I will be waiting for your reply for the legal documents to ensure that
the agent will proceed with the delivery without a hitch.
Regards,
Diplomat Steve Marshall Page
United Nations Diplomatic Foreign Mission

subject: Re: United Nations
body:
Hello Diplomat Steve Marshall Page,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about the completion of the delivery process. I'm curious, though, could you please explain a bit more about these legal documents that need to be secured on my behalf? What exactly do they entail?

Also, I'm wondering why the diplomatic agent isn't aware that the boxes contain funds. Is this a standard procedure in such operations?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Albert
